lenders.name: Bert
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference for families in need
lenders.occupational_info: I help business owners to have more impact in their communities

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: When so little can make such a difference - there is no other choice.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Business Coach. A large part of my work, through a contract with a local CED organization, "Momentum", is coaching Immigrants and the underemployed in my community through the start up and initial operation of their own micro-business.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to make such a large difference and, because we are fortunate, we should share that with others...
lenders.occupational_info:
Developing strategies for healthy and vibrant communities. Nurturing public-private-grassroots partnerships for market transformations.
http://www.linkedin.com/in/martintull
http://www.greensportsalliance.org

lenders.name: Jed and Jude
lenders.loan_because: It's cool to help people who are trying to make their life better. What little blessings we can share is always something for those who are in need.  We hope  we can positively impact someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now I am a student in High School and my little brother is in the 4th Grade. Currently I am also working to finish an Associate Degree in Arts in an Early College Program.  We like to play football and are also active in AWANA Club at our local church. During vacation time we travel to see other places and it is sad to learn that some people are really in need.  My parents talked to me about Kiva and we are glad that we can make a difference in somebody else's life.  Hopefully I can save more out of my school allowance to fund my involvement with Kiva.  My parents promised me to match every dollar I save when that savings is used to help others.

lenders.name: Luc
lenders.loan_because:
We live in a connected world where the divide between the haves and have-nots cannot be ignored or tolerated. Thanks to Kiva, cost-effective ways to share even the smallest part of one's earnings has never been easier and more satisfying. 

As would be the case in a garden, this site enables us to share our seeds to help out those seeking to grow for themselves. This isn't just a loan, it's the sharing of empowerment.

lenders.name: Polly & Neil
lenders.loan_because: we want to help someone
lenders.occupational_info: Polly is an analyst in the Finance Department at a major hospital and Neil has recently retired from Government service

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Being fortunate enough to have disposable income I would like to put it to some good use in the world.

lenders.name: Larry
lenders.loan_because: I would not have been successful without someone helping me.
lenders.occupational_info: I grow corn and soybeans for a living in the fertile soils of the Midwestern United States.

lenders.name: Eric & Ann
lenders.loan_because: We want to share our prosperity and good fortune with others.  We want to make up for some of the recent misadventures of our government by showing that some Americans remain concerned about the welfare of  average people throughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy working with students in a multi-cultural environment

lenders.name: Cassedy
lenders.loan_because: I care and I think that everyone deserves a chance to have a better life. I feel happy that I'm able to help, because I know most people in the world aren't as lucky as me.
lenders.occupational_info:
I'm a 15 year old student. I'm in 10th grade and been with Kiva since 5th grade. I recently started volunteering with special needs kids at a hippotherapy stable. The special bond that forms between the kids & the horses can really help improve so many disabilities. I should know because it worked for me! 
I also run a dog walking/pet sitting business in my town so everyday is a new fun adventure!

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I plan parties, events, conferences and festivals.  My most recent project was an international choral festival which brought singers from around the world to my hometown.

lenders.name: MJS
lenders.loan_because: I hope to help educate children.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: It's a good way to help people around the world.  I'm not a rich man, but I can help in some small way to enable people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I perform the daily care and feeding of airliners and airline passengers.

lenders.name: armando jorge
lenders.loan_because: I care.
lenders.occupational_info: :) ask me     justiceiro_6@hotmail.com

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed in my life and now I am  able to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I buy and sell collectible coins and currency

lenders.name: Katie and Kelsey
lenders.loan_because: We like knowing that we can make a difference in the world.

lenders.name: JVF
lenders.loan_because: "To born, to die, to reborn yet again and progress continuously - this is the path".

lenders.name: Jen
lenders.loan_because: I am able to, and that's what those that are able to should do.

lenders.name: Cait
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly fortunate to be living where I am and to have two parents that both have well paying jobs. I think it is only right to help people who need it, since I am able to.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: my fiance and I are giving each other gifts of experience rather than of things.  He will have hours of joy investing and reinvesting in peoples' lives around the world.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: My day job is an Electrical Engineer working on the design on Wind Farm projects and Industrial sites.

lenders.name: Jean
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other
lenders.occupational_info: Healthcare

lenders.name: sandy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in Jesus Christ who is no respector of class or position in life, we are all one in this world and should share what God has given us, all is owned by him.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate the flow of people who need things with people who can help them with their needs.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because:
I don't have the resources to make big changes in the world.  In the US, I'm actually considered poor.  But Kiva is an opportunity to make real changes in a person's quality of life. Every time I make a loan, I feel like I'm helping the world become a better place. Some people can make anything happen, if just given the chance. For the price of a pizza and beer I can help give someone the chance to make their dreams come true, to truly change their life.  And when the loan is repayed, it gives me faith that people around the world are honorable. 

Little things do make a big difference in the world.  It doesn't have to be a loan. It can be letting another car turn in front of you or stopping to pick up a discarded plastic bottle on the sidewalk and disposing of it properly. Karma. Small insignificant acts of kindness add up and become a movement when more people get involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a biologist.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: The opportunity to make a difference in people's lives is the key to why I enjoy providing loans.  The simplicity of this organization is a great idea and one I'm proud to be a part of.
lenders.occupational_info: I lead the operations of a consulting organization for a software company.  I work from a home office.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: Having been homeless at one point in my life and living in the streets I know what its like not to have your basic needs. I want to help out others so they dont have to experience the same as I did.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: It's fun to watch the entrepreneurs progress and feel like you have helped.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a carpet cleaning business that also cleans furniture and persian/oriental rugs.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with their teeth.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I paint backgrounds for cartoons.

lenders.name: Marc & Nikki Shank
lenders.loan_because: It makes us feel so good to be able to help a little in this unfair world.
lenders.occupational_info: We are retired and we volunteer at the local Hospital and Boy Scouts as Merit Badge teachers. We enjoy travel everywhere golf and just working on our home.

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: Feels great!

lenders.name: Peter Pappas
lenders.loan_because: It's the least I can do.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping other teachers do their best.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: This is such a unique way to make a personal contribution to someone's success in life.  Putting a face or faces on the people receiving the loans gives me a sense of being some small part of their lives.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a children's health clinic.

lenders.name: Kirsta
lenders.loan_because: Financial empowerment for women speaks volumes!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach instrumental music in schools and privately.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of being able  to help other people help themselves via hard work thru KIVA's micro-loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I have worked in the area of music recording and Internet gaming.

lenders.name: Aftab & Talat
lenders.loan_because: We all need to give back to society and make the world better place for everyone.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: how could I not?
lenders.occupational_info: recent anthropology grad

lenders.name: Mark & Terry
lenders.loan_because: the rewards are so great!
lenders.occupational_info:
Terry teaches children.
Mark teaches Carpentry

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I lived for several years in Indonesia and have especially fond memories of my many weeks spent in Bali enjoying the culture and the people. I am delighted to help to build a business for a woman in Bali. Terima Kasih!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a nature and wildlife photographer. I use my photos and inspirational verse to create custom books and greeting cards that use the beauty of nature to encourage people who are facing life and health challenges and to celebrate the happy occasions in their lives.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I care

lenders.name: a friend
lenders.loan_because: I live in a developed nation. I have a job that pays the bills with money left over. $5.00 or even $50.00 will not financially cripple me. People need to stop and realize that giving out a few dollars here and there will not ruin them and in turn, will help someone in need.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: someone needs it

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: Loving kindness to others we do not know, is the mission we all have been given in this life. We each can make a difference in someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work from my home making web sites for small businesses.

lenders.name: Brad Dunshee
lenders.loan_because: I believe in becoming a change agent and feel that this model is a wonderful idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop interactive strategies and manage them through to execution.  Websites, marketing campaigns, search marketing, etc.  I do photography on the side, mostly weddings and events.  A percentage of my profits from photography goes to microfinance.

lenders.name: Elyse
lenders.loan_because: It's important to help others.  I'm in a position to help give others a chance to do something with their lives-and by helping them, i get something in return; the knowledge that someone may have had their dreams come true because I contributed to their business!  Thanks to my big bro and his generous gift!

lenders.name: Terri
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the people provide an income for themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Selling airplane parts for maintance of aircraft.

lenders.name: JTH
lenders.loan_because: i can right now.
lenders.occupational_info: working with children in a busy urban area.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: It is important to help everywhere in the world, not just in my own community and most especially to help the women of these countries succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I basically help people find jobs in the fields of banking and finance.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.occupation: Retired high school counselor and teacher
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping people help themselves.  It's why I also support Heiffer and Women for Women.

lenders.name: Cristen
lenders.loan_because: I love helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of California, Riverside.

lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organization called Friends of Honduran Children

lenders.name: chelsey
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make a better life...

lenders.name: garth
lenders.loan_because: It is an easy responsible way to help provide what is dearly lacking in underpriviledged societies.....capital to help them help theirselves.

lenders.name: Vicky
lenders.loan_because: Jesus tells us that to whom much has been given much is required. So it is my duty to lend when the Lord has blessed me and my family so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I recently graduated from university and am currently working as an intern for an economic development corporation in Peterborough, Ontario, Canada.

lenders.name: Alejundro
lenders.loan_because: I think is a great idea. I was unsure at the time. It took me a while to sign up but now that I've done it, I'm so excited about it. To be able to help someone out like this is amazing and it's so easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a call center with over 800 people. My wok group I am responsible for supports business customers and their wireless accounts. They manage anywhere from 5-999 lines of service per account. It's up to me to make sure they know what products are available to our customers and how to troubleshoot them if there are any issues with billing or just how to use the product to make their business more efficient. I've been in my job for over 10 years and it's ever changing. It really is the reason why I love what I do.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.occupational_info: i also work as a beach cashier in the summer. i scan beach permits and take money of non permit holders so they can get on the beach. when it rains i read alot during the day because no one goes to the beach.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: It's great to be able to give people a hand in expanding their business and to share our good fortune. My wife and I are really happy to be able to participate in this program.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an applied scientist.  I work in a powerplant.  My wife trained as a chef and is now a caterer.

lenders.name: Baltimore Family
lenders.loan_because: We  wish to share our blessings with others around the world.

lenders.name: Rena
lenders.loan_because: I believe in reciprocity. Much has been given to me. As an African-American woman I have priviliedges that are not afforded to other women. I have the oportunity to do and be anything I want. I am living my dream of working for myself.  I want to empower other entrepreneurs to get closer to thier dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people save thier homes from foreclosure. I negotiate lenders to come up with an afforable settlement the home-owner can afford. I have a 97% success rate.

lenders.name: Genet
lenders.loan_because: I love to be part of the Kiva team that stands for a  noble cause.  It is also wonderful to be able to help those who work hard to make their life better.
lenders.occupational_info: I enjoy what I do.  I like to  reach out to whose who are in need.  I give as  I have received from others when I needed help.   God bless you all.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because:
Because we have it too easy.  People in the developing areas of India literally cook the circuit boards out of our old, "recycled" computers and electronics.  They breath in all of these chemicals and they are killing themselves.  Not only do adults do this but kids do it to.  They have to do it to be able to make a small living, big enough to buy food. 
     The river that runs through their town is called the Black River because that is what it is.  It lights on fire several times a year.  But we can stop this.  Using Kiva and other programs we can help these people live a better, heather, more civilized life.
     I loan because there is more to life than stuff and things.  Because there are people in this world other than me.  Because it feels good to help one another and because they need the help.

lenders.name: Jordan
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way of empowering people without creating dependency! Charity is wonderful, but this is better, because it enables people to use the skills and talents they already have.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying international development and economics.

lenders.name: Sally and Lauren
lenders.loan_because: Lauren and I want to change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Mom and daughter. IT and student

lenders.name: Isabella
lenders.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity for so many people!  Every little thing can make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student, but once I'm finished with school I hope to do human rights work, and this is a wonderful way to start that dream.

lenders.name: Elisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others live.
lenders.occupational_info: I love on people in Jesus' name.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: People helping people, that's what it's about. This is a simple way to make a difference in someone's life, by helping them become self-sufficient for years to come, and help those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician looking for ways to help other people. I play acoustic guitar and write music for others as well.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone should have the ability to contribute their talents to a greater degree.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping to improve homes for better energy efficiency.

lenders.name: Ryan
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student at Humboldt State University. I knit hats and scarves to make spending money

lenders.name: Brad
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in the world

lenders.name: Jesse and Georgia
lenders.loan_because: People are nice.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I  believe in the power of one person to make the world a better place with God's help.
lenders.occupational_info: My career has been in service of students with disabilities and their families.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.occupational_info: I help people work for justice on issues such as education and health care

lenders.name: Crystal & Christina
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in people's lives around the world in a sustainable and meaningful way

lenders.name: NTFM
lenders.loan_because: We are the employees of a small cafe in Orlando, FL. We sell sandwiches and smoothies to provide for our families. We lend through Kiva to help others provide for theirs.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I was looking for a more personal way to help people than generic  large charities.  Kiva is a fantastic way to do just that.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan so they can avoid, prevent or lessen the impact of a crisis situation.

lenders.name: Angi
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people become home owners.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: I'm taking a chance this isn't a scam.

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a wonderful idea to help others in worse economic conditions but with the same good ideas

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy.
lenders.occupational_info: Mobile Telecommunications.

lenders.name: Debbi
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much and I want to help extend an opportunity to others to expand their business. My parents and others in my life have believed in me and encouraged me to pursue my dreams and goals, and I want to pass that on to others.

lenders.name: Naledi
lenders.occupation: Star - that\'s what my name means :)

lenders.name: Alyce
lenders.loan_because: this process works.  It is important to me to be able to make a positive difference in the world.  It's such a small amount of money in the world I come from but it can do so much good.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with numbers.  I keep the financial accounts of my company.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Change begins with the individual.

lenders.name: Cate
lenders.loan_because: Whatever is shared multiplies.

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.occupational_info: I work in computer software.  I like working with the technology and solving problems that businesses need help solving.

lenders.name: Jeff & Barbara
lenders.occupation: Jeff is IT Professional, Barbara is a teacher.
lenders.loan_because: We loan as a way to help people in a personal way to achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Barbara is a second grade teacher. Jeff is an IT professional

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that charity where one gets something for nothing is demeaning to the recipient.  

When governments get involved, there is bribery, theft, diversion of funds to pet projects, corruption and government control.

Obviously, people, not governments, should take care of children, the aged, and the disabled.  

For all others, I believe that the better solution is to help people help themselves, and this organization does just that. 

If you lend them something to an individual and they pay it back, it gives them a sense of personal satisfaction which builds their confidence and, in turn, their self-esteem and sense of worth.

As an individual with MS, a paralyzed right side, and confined to a wheelchair for the past 10 years, I have some experience in how the handicapped are treated by others, and how to combat it.
lenders.occupational_info:
Retired U.S. Army
Retired Attorney

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who would stand up and do something....take a risk...stick their neck out a bit.  I want to encouage them because through their actions, the whole society around them can be mad e stronger.
lenders.occupational_info:
First, I help companies understand their existing risk of financial loss from natural catastrophies such as hurricanes and earthquakes.
Second, I advise them what they can do about reducing that loss potential other than just buying insurance.  Retro-fitting buildings in non-traditional ways is a specialty.

lenders.name: Tom of Carlsbad
lenders.loan_because: I can help.
lenders.occupational_info: For over four decades I was a public administrator with the State of California.  Now retired I still wish to be of help, especially to those who have the dignity and strength to provide for themselves and others through small businesses.  My wife and I love international travel and have benefited from many such small businesses and so it is my turn to return a benefit to them.

lenders.name: Tom and Nancy
lenders.loan_because: Kiva loans keep us connected to the world. By sharing what we can, we build bridges.
lenders.occupational_info: Tom is a retired tax accountant, Nancy is a retired RN, both still very active in volunteer jobs in their community in Northern California.

lenders.name: paris
lenders.loan_because: I want to see people in other countries truly being happy with what they are doing. I want families' lives to change. I want mothers to feel that their children will have a better life than they did. I want the world to find a way and connect with one another. Kiva is that way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am attending school and I am a young activist. I love to travel and after seeing poverty at such a young age, I felt that it was necessary to help others across the globe.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: I don't need any more 'stuff' so I figured that I could help others get stuff that will change their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage large heavy civil construction projects.  Dams, pipelines, reservoirs, sewers, etc.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.loan_because: I feel that even at a young age people should be helping echother. We don't have world peace yet, but this might bring us closer to other cultures. So I loan because i want to be part of the uniting of OUR world

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: This is a practical way to love my neighbor no matter where they are in the world.  Thank you Kiva!
lenders.occupational_info: Small business consulting

lenders.name: Lauren and Dan
lenders.loan_because: We believe in a world where people help each other!
lenders.occupational_info: A therapist is someone who helps others work through personal issues. A statistician uses a variety of mathematical skills to manipulate and analyze data.

lenders.name: Erinn
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I coordinate large meetings, events, congresses, tradeshows, incentive trips for US coporporations and we take them any where in the world. I love what I do, every day is different and challenging.

lenders.name: Vanola
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a little help now and then, and this is how I can help.  It is truly the "gift that keeps on giving."

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I wish to extend a hand to my sisters and brothers in friendship and peace.

lenders.name: Charlene
lenders.loan_because: I feel that I lead a very privileged life and have all that I could ask for,  thus feel it is my duty & obligation, and honour,  to help others in need, especially those that are willing to work hard to pull themselves out of poverty with a little assistance. Such a worthy cause!
lenders.occupational_info: I design & fabricate stained glass projects (on a small scale at this point) for interested people - mostly commissioned pieces. I also teach beginner stained glass classes occasionally.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.loan_because: The smallest act of kindness is worth more than the grandest intention.
lenders.occupational_info: I build computer systems for Pharmaceutical company.

lenders.name: Ben
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Bridget
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in someone's life. One little loan can truly change a life.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who have not been as lucky as I have been. I would rather lend than give because I think lending is a better way to encourage self-reliance. I lend directly to try to avoid supporting government and administration people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people keep track of where their money goes.

lenders.name: Mark from Reno, NV
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide a safe, peaceful lifelong home to rescued and abused farm animals.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together!

lenders.name: Ella
lenders.loan_because: Because I want people to be healthy, have a good life, and for the children to grow up to be very healthy people.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school, I get out a book, and I look inside the book for things I want to research.  Then I draw a picture about what I learned.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: In this small, small world, we help ourselves by helping each other. We are all one.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: All people of good will have a moral obligation to assist others in need. It is important that the people of the world understand American Christians love them, and are truly interested in helping them make their lives better. Global prosperity helps everyone!
lenders.occupational_info: I own a news and information website that tells Internet readers about events in the community where I live.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Successful, empowered individuals will ultimately create a peaceful world.

lenders.name: Erik
lenders.loan_because: It's a wondeful way to help people help themselvs.
lenders.occupational_info: I simply fix trains that is broken. Nothing fancy. Infact I'm really grateful to be able to help, doing what I do.

lenders.name: steven
lenders.loan_because: i'm board and loanly :(
lenders.occupational_info: Board

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help hard working, less fortunate people obtain a higher standard of living.

lenders.name: Allyson
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people in need.

lenders.name: Bon Fir Cabin
lenders.loan_because: The Bon Fir Cabin is a successful cabin rental business in Rhododendron, Oregon near Mt Hood. We have had visitors from all over the world. I know how hard it can be to get a business loan and I want to help others in lower income areas to decrease global income inequality.
lenders.occupational_info: The Bon Fir is a beautifully restored 1930's cabin located in the foothills of Mount Hood. It is located just 43 Miles from the Portland, Oregon airport, 10 miles to skiing and less than a mile from the Mount Hood Wilderness Area. The cabin is fully equipped and modernized with a full kitchen, cozy wood stove, a queen bed, and a 4 person Hot Tub.

lenders.name: Wendy
lenders.loan_because: I want to share with others and help lift others up.
lenders.occupational_info: I have three small children and i work with them to understand the challenges others face and to respect hard work.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: So when they had finished breakfast, Jesus said to Simon Peter, 'Simon, son of John, do you love Me more than these?' He said to Him, 'Yes Lord; You know that I love You.' He said to him, 'Tend My lambs.' He said to him again a second time, 'Simon, son of John, do you love Me?' He said to Him, 'Yes, Lord; You know that I love You.' He said to him, 'Shepherd My sheep.' He said to him the third time, 'Simon, son of John, do you love Me?' Peter was grieved because He said to him the third time, 'Do you love Me?' And he said to Him, 'Lord, You know all things; You know that I love You.' Jesus said to him, 'Tend My sheep.'" (John 21:15-17, NASB).

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to give.  It feels better to help people who are working really hard to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm responsible for a group of peope who write computer programs.

lenders.loan_because: Mom made me

lenders.name: Krista

lenders.occupational_info: I work as a nurse caring for people at the very end of their lives.

lenders.name: Jorge
lenders.occupational_info: Create games that entertain people on the computer.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Mat
lenders.loan_because: I like to see that the money I'm contributing is making such a difference in others' lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Conducting various tasks on machines in a warehouse

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: is necessary to help the people who need the most.
lenders.occupational_info: Propaganda Minister

lenders.name: BEVLA
lenders.loan_because: I love to see deserving people prosper!
lenders.occupational_info: I manufacture Clip-in Hair Extensions for HairConspiracy.Com and I facilitate success work shops for women launching and growing businesses in Arizona as a LadiesWhoLaunch.Com leader.

lenders.name: John & Robin
lenders.loan_because: God has given to us ...so we can share with others

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: We all need to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Ron and Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because:
“What we have done for ourselves alone dies with us; what we have done for others and the world remains and is immortal.”
--- Albert Pike

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Kiva microloans are baby steps toward a better world. Giving is better than receiving.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and manage capital growth strategies for individuals & institutions.

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other women around the world become financially independent.
lenders.occupational_info: Volunteering my computer skills to help my community.

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides a great way to act towards income redistribution in a small way.

lenders.name: Glen
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone needs a Hand Up...
I got mine, now its time to Help them
get their Hand Up...
If everyone does a Little a whole lot will be accomplished...
lenders.occupational_info:
I am a Disabled Combat Marine...  Retired...
Am a Veterans Service Officer helping other Combat Veterans to
receive their just Compensation...

lenders.name: Nick B
lenders.loan_because: It does good for someone.

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.occupational_info: I publish information about companies in Argentina since 1997, and I organize golf tournaments for amateurs players.

lenders.name: Jenni
lenders.loan_because: I may not be able to loan a huge amount, but my small contribution, pooled with other people's small contributions, can change someone's life. I like that this isn't a hand-out; it's a way to help someone better their own life in a way that helps them retain their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies provide retirement benefits for their employees, by doing mathematical tests that prove that their plans meet government requirements for fairness.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: maybe, I can be the difference that makes the difference
lenders.occupational_info: I own a commercial fishing boat in Alaska

lenders.name: Tad
lenders.loan_because: I think it's neat
lenders.occupational_info: research into nuclear detection and contaminant analysis

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: everyone everywhere deserves a chance!

lenders.name: Sean & Matthew
lenders.loan_because: we're learning how to do good in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We're 5 & 3 and hope to grow up learning that we can change the world one good deed at a time.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other people become financially secure and be able to provide for themselves and their families.  I want my grandson to inherit a peaceful world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to protect and preserve land for wildlife and natural habitat.  I fear that we are losing many of the plant an animal species that make this world so beautiful and interesting.

lenders.name: Alisha
lenders.loan_because: I have a great life and i would like to make sure someone eles can have a happy life too.

lenders.name: thom
lenders.loan_because: I want to give hope
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn ways to better communicate and deal with conflict

lenders.name: Jeremy
lenders.loan_because:
The rest of the world needs access to money too. 
The U.S has enough flat screens.
lenders.occupational_info:
I.T. to pay the bills.
J.D. degree to make a difference.

lenders.name: Aaron & Robin
lenders.loan_because: We believe capitalism is the best way to alleviate human suffering in the world.

lenders.name: Nathan
lenders.loan_because: People in need without the means to climb out of poverty need other humans to go to bat for them.
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves teaching Thai kids english while persuing a route to continue my university eduation at Webster University Thailand

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: People have helped me. Now I can help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people decide where and how to invest their money.

lenders.name: Marva
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Billy
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the world as a community, I believe in helping my fellow world citizens.
lenders.occupational_info: I train individuals on aerospace equipment.

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: There are millions of great minds and ideas that lack only access to credit.  With access to financial tools, the possibilities are endless.
lenders.occupational_info: I study economics at Texas A&M University.

lenders.name: Garth
lenders.loan_because: everyone needs a hand at some time and if my little bit helps, that's great
lenders.occupational_info: I believe that business owners deserve to get more from their business.  For their investment, the stress and for the time the put in, they deserve more.  That's why I help business owners get more from their business.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is THE most incredible nonprofit out there.  High impact, sustainable, and a joy to be a part of.

lenders.name: Julia goolia
lenders.loan_because: Because fishing is so much better than drowning.  Can I give you a hand to the riverside my friend?
lenders.occupational_info: When I am not busy with my children, or my gardens, I work with computers to make them work better for companies.

lenders.name: WellBalanced House
lenders.loan_because: Ayni - the (Inka) Law of Reciprocity

lenders.name: Solaiman Rahim
lenders.loan_because: "the worst of the violence is poverty" - Mahatma Ghandi

lenders.name: bob
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good!

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.loan_because: I care about others and I want to help give others the chance to succeed.  I hope to see Kiva expand to many other areas!
lenders.occupational_info: I farm a small farm and work at a manufacturing plant at night.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.occupational_info: I build products that help people live healthier lives.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Helping people who take the initiative to apply for loans to help themselves is just the greatest idea!  I found the link to this program thanks to remhq.com.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the home health field and visit people in their homes to provide them with physical therapy.

lenders.name: Asha Mokashi
lenders.loan_because:
I can. Most of us can so easily part with $25 dollars to help hard-working honest entrepreneurs across the world - and not have our lives affected by it in any way. 
And it is a one-time investment - you just keep re-loaning the same amount each time a borrower pays it back. 
So what's stopping you?

lenders.name: Alie
lenders.loan_because: With a small amount  we can make the difference  !
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a haire dresser for people who are not able  to go out of the house , `cause they are of old age or disabled .

lenders.name: iris
lenders.loan_because: as an individual I think that this is a good way to have an impact on someones life and their family eventhough they are far away because as a jewish I believe that if you save one soul it is as if you have saved an intire world, it is not just that person but his family as wel. It is also something that I want to pass on to my girls.
lenders.occupational_info: loving them, listening to them, being there for them trying to rase them up with the awareness that there are people in this world whom are less fortunate.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is one of the most powerful forces for positive change in a society.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage research to understand the constraints to growth for small & medium enterprises in developing countries.

lenders.name: Lyn
lenders.occupational_info: Success & Happiness....is hard work, honesty and believing in yourself.

lenders.name: Lauri
lenders.loan_because: I hope that wealth spread around can create even more wealth.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to give.
lenders.occupational_info: teaching with technology.

lenders.name: The Williams Family
lenders.loan_because: We feel that any one, given a chance, can accomplish things they never thought possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the electrical industry building large buildings.

lenders.name: Ken
lenders.loan_because: To give people less fortunate, the opportunity to become self-sufficient ,improve their quality of life and provide the necessities for a secure future.
lenders.occupational_info: Previously worked in Insurance and Commercial Finance..

lenders.name: Joe & Marsha
lenders.loan_because: We have all had help in life and we all need to help when and where we can.
lenders.occupational_info: Joe-Responded to fire and health emergencies for a large city. Marsha-Assists employees of our local county.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.occupational_info: I teach yoga and work to bring healing and self-awareness to my students.

lenders.name: Agnes
lenders.loan_because: I am incredibly blessed and want to share my good fortune.  Kiva is very appealing because I like the way it helps people become self-sustaining and build net worth, which in turn benefits the local economy.

lenders.name: Arfaan
lenders.loan_because: If you give a man a fish he will feed himself for a day, if you teach him how to fish he will feed himself for a lifetime!!

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: There are many good folks in the world that need a little boost.

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I want to support because it is fun helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student now and I am interested in learning more about other countries and people.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: It makes perfect sense
lenders.occupational_info: We try to help address the world's huge problems such as poverty and access to medicines, energy etc by working with social entrepreneurs who are trying to do the same - we try to leverage them.

lenders.name: Corey
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be happy just like I am happy.  May all beings be free from suffering.

lenders.name: Robert & Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: We have recently started our own business and know how difficult it can be here in America.  We cannot comprehend how many more challenges are faced by those on the Kiva website.  We only hope our small contribution can bring a few others closer to realizing their dreams for a better life.

lenders.name: Mikel
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way for me to express my Christianity.  I also think this is a better alternative to occupation and war as a way to build up civilizations.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the construction industry plastering walls.

lenders.name: Maria Gyory  - Miami Fl.
lenders.loan_because: I felt very impressed on how the organization works. I loved the fact that we are helping people help themselves. I greatly respect the hard working families that are trying to give a better future for their children and for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach children. I help them to learn how to read and write, and how to become a better citizen of the world.

lenders.name: Ivan
lenders.loan_because: I'm an immigrant and left my home country about 14 years ago. In my previous job I traveled all over the world and always wondered how I could help some of the people I saw. This is the opportunity I was looking for.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major company which has offices in every country around the World. I make sure the software works well and help in solving problems. Normally my work is used by companies that have several thousand of employees. I helped many of them in 14 years, now it's time to help people outside of this circle.

lenders.name: Geoffrey
lenders.loan_because: I'm able to.

lenders.name: Katja
lenders.loan_because: I´d like to make a difference in the world. The world isn´t here to exploit one half of the population to maintain the other halfs comfortable lifestyle. Everyone should have his share of wealth, this can lead to global understanding and peace.
lenders.occupational_info: I´m working in productdevelopment, advertising, marketing and exhibitions for a paper company.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: small things done with great Love can change the world.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I like the opportunity to help other people around the world who are interested in building their own business like I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell Health & Life Insurance to Small Business owners around the united States

lenders.name: Bill and Brenda
lenders.loan_because: We like the idea of helping people directly.  The concept of giving to start a business to provide a family's livelihood is very appealing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a corporate pilot and Brenda is a school psychologist who helps children with special needs in elementary and middle school.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: In many respects, the globe is rapidly becoming one village.  Through KIVA, we all have the opportunity to act like good neighbors, wherever we may be.

lenders.name: Isadora
lenders.loan_because: i believe equally in hope and ingenuity.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy seeing the conceptualization of an idea and transforming it into reality.  It may take a variety of resources such as research, development, networking and lending of money to actualize its manifestation.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the area of utilizing existing financial services and transforming them into new applications for the use of money.  Money has now transformed into an information model and can be used in new and creative ways.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help women who struggle to provide for their families and themselves, as my mother did.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students who have difficulty learning math.

lenders.name: Bio Legal
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance for a decent life. I respect people who make an effort for themselves and their families. I am grateful that I am in the position to support that. By lending money (instead of giving) people can remain independent and retain their selfrespect.
lenders.occupational_info: (mostly) negotiating and drafting co-operation agreements in the field of (public-private) research projects.

lenders.name: Marco
lenders.loan_because: Little money but at the just moment can produce important fruits
lenders.occupational_info: I work  the wood in order to produce parts for musical instruments and furnishing

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: It's so easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I embroider clothing for companies.

lenders.name: Albert
lenders.loan_because: I believe in loans more than in charity. They enable people to take their lives in their own hands and keep their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in charge of marketing and developing software for scientific research.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to make a big difference in someone's life.

lenders.name: Vera
lenders.loan_because: My family has survived because of the kindness of others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help children grow into members of a kinder society.

lenders.name: Boris
lenders.loan_because: I want people to be successful in work & life in general. I love to see people be proud of there goals and achievements.
lenders.occupational_info: Non Stop, I work an average of 12 hours a day, 7 days a week, I Travel all over the world working in the Aviation / Aerospace / Metrology / Bio-Med Industries. My work consists of very technical work and working with people and projects. I love to work hard, I do this to take care of my family and there future. My parents were are originally from Europe and immigrated to the USA in the 1959, I am a first generation child of our family and I was always raised to take care of family / friends and work hard for what you want in life.

lenders.name: Kayla
lenders.loan_because: I love to help other people out and it makes me so happy

lenders.name: Ethan
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurs who do not have other means to access capital.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage money for a major financial institution.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a program for children between the ages of 5-12 to make sure that they have a healthy, safe and nuturing place to learn, grow and play, while their parents are at work.

lenders.name: Jayna
lenders.loan_because: I've always been internationally-minded, and this is a great way to make an impact on someone across the world who could use my help.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses market themselves on the internet through search engines.

lenders.name: Phyllis
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a really important organization, and a great way for entrepreneurs to get funded.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell flags and banners

lenders.name: Su
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Ed Maxwell
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are willing to venture out and work hard to better their lives and that of their family's
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.occupational_info: I help families of children with disabilities

lenders.name: Celia
lenders.loan_because: My aunt gave me a KIVA gift certificate for Christmas, and since then I have been loaning. I really enjoy giving back to communities through community service and now KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freshman at Cornell University. I am studying hospitality management and hope to one day be a manager of a hotel.

lenders.name: Peyton
lenders.loan_because: I know a wonderful woman named Bridget that introduced me to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: Big Brewers Fan (that's baseball)!
